column1: # Tsv configuration file of colocalization runs Each colocalization run has a
# ColocName used to name output files QTLsGenotypeSet is [''|'HarmonizedSNPs'].
# 'HarmonizedSNPs' will use same set of SNPs for all phenotypes for QTLmapping
# and colocalization. '' will use intersection of SNPs for colocalization
# for gene-wise molQTL colocalization. ForGWASColoc is for GWAS-locus-wise
# colocalization MolPhenotypesToColoc is an optional space separated list of
# mol Phenotype wildcards to include in colocalization. If none is provided,
# will default to PhenotypesToColoc in common.py

column4: chRNA.IR chRNA.Expression.Splicing H3K27AC CTCF H3K4ME3 chRNA.Splicing MetabolicLabelled.30min MetabolicLabelled.60min Expression.Splicing.Subset polyA.Splicing.Subset polyA.IR.Subset chRNA.Expression_cheRNA chRNA.Expression_eRNA chRNA.Expression_lncRNA chRNA.Expression_snoRNA
